title: Rahul Dua - Oh Hello!
overview: The funny and relatable Rahul Dua is in Delhi for his first-ever stand-up comedy special. Indian parents, his parents, the chai obsession, his passion - sleeping - why hotels are the worst when it comes to comfort and his one night stand, which became a mockdrill, literally - Rahul is here to talk about it all with a surprise entry at the end.
